items.question: Is this coaching or therapy?
items.answer: Coaching, not therapy—we will signpost therapy when that is safer for you.

items.question: What are our time expectations?
items.answer: We start and end on time so you can plan around sessions with confidence.

items.question: How do you handle notes and data?
items.answer: We keep minimal notes and delete them on request within agreed retention windows.

items.question: Who sets the pace?
items.answer: You set the pace; we provide structure and accountability without pressure.
